title: Is Vibrant Academy good for the IIT JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of my friend is from vibrant Academy But he was dropping this year .when I ask how was the environment there he said all is good but there is too rush in the classes number of students are their in batch I don't know how match . He said that the all the faculty are good . Modules they made are good. Classes are well good . But is up to you how you take the advantage of good teachers . See every institute are good in there way is up to you how you study,how you inbuilt yourself.hardworking students study anywhere .. It's all about you how good you are … Upvote if information helpful for you

Every academy is good It totally depends on you that how much time you are devoting in your iit jee preparation. They only guide you and solve your problems but it is on you to do daily all sufficient activities which help you in succeding. For any further query regarding jee advance preparation and jee counselling session feel free to text message on whatsapp number 7372930113.
